ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] good news!
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/22/00 4:34:54 PM Eastern Standard Time, Lyrnia@home.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/22/00 4:34:54 PM Eastern Standard Time, Lyrnia@...
writes:

<< I really hate it when a bard who hasn't explored all the uses for the more
powerful songs we get disses one as "it's not useful". >>

I really hate it when a bard doesn't know another bard and assumes things, in
turn making themselves look foolish.

I have used charm extensively, but now being 50 i hardly ever use it. Bats/
bugs etc aren't charmable, and now guk is a joke. I haven't been back there
in months. Sure, upgraded song would allow us to charm higher level things,
but I am hoping for all new songs, not just rehashes. But oh well, replying
to this is pretty pointless. . I love how because I post my views on how I
would like to play in the expansion it is "wrong". I think your post is
obvious flame bait. What level are you ? sign your posts please, I honestly
don't know how to reply seeing as I have no idea where you are coming from.
Bleh , go camp something , that seems to be what makes you happy.
Fine, I was just saying I would like songs with both form and function. I
don't play to camp anymore, I play for friends, for raids, and to help out
lower level people. I will prolly stay on longer if at least a couple of our
songs had some sort of RP applicable aspect to them ( the illusion one being
a great one ) but I doubt you know what RP is , nor have any interest in it.
Good luck , get 50 ( you win ! ) then get 60 ( you win ! ) then quit
and go back to Quake.

Ulaien Firsesong
"this is not helping my faith in sticking around in this game"
50 bard tunare.
